thread.title: Comfortable, friendly quirky and convenient.
thread.title_full: Comfortable, friendly quirky and convenient. - Review of Idol Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dragonspal
title: Comfortable, friendly quirky and convenient.
text: We stayed here for three nights. The staff were very welcoming, the room was unusually decorated and very comfortable. Subtle and flexible lighting, facilities to play our own music, and a wonderful shower. Music theme throughout. Location close to Europe metro stop, so all of Paris accessible.
